deleteConfirmationQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete?

claimNetwork.claimNetworkInfo:
To add an IoT device to your list, provide its unique identifier (UUID, 36-characters).

Use camera to scan the code printed on your device.
claimNetwork.enterUUID: if QR code scanning doesn't work for you, enter the identifier  in the field above.
claimNetwork.manufacturerAsOwnerWarning: the manufacturer of this device has full access to this device data. Do you want to add this device to your account?

cameraPermission.denied: Please give access to Camera to scan the QR code
cameraPermission.title: camera permission is required
cameraPermission.message: the app needs access to phone camera to scan the QR code

claimNetwork.scanQRCode: tap here to scan QR code
claimNetwork.noUUID: failed to find UUID. Try to re-scan or enter it manualy.

permissionError.bluetoothGeneric: Enable bluetooth to continue. Bluetooth is required to find nearby devices.
permissionError.bluetoothNotSupported: This feature requires Bluetooth yet your phone does not support it.
permissionError.location: Enable precise location to continue. Location is required to find nearby devices.

progress.negotiateSecurity: negotiating security with the IoT device
progress.getDeviceWifiList: getting Wi-Fi list from the device
progress.waitDeviceConnect: waiting for the IoT device to connect
progress.addNetwork: registering the IoT device in the cloud

error.failedConnect: failed to connect to the device.
error.failedNegotiateSecurity: failed to negotiate security with the device.
error.failedNegotiateSecurityTimeout: the device did not send back the security key.
error.failedGetDeviceWifiList: failed to get Wi-Fi list from the device
error.failedGetDeviceWifiListTimeout: failed to get Wi-Fi list from the device(device did not answer)
error.failedRetrieveTimeout: failed to communicate with the device.
error.failedNotUuid: wrong UUID was received from the device.
error.rejectedManufacturerAsOwner: Device was not registered to your account since you have rejected device data sharing with the manufacturer of the device.

wifiScan.noWifiFound: no Wi-Fi networks were found. If your Wi-Fi access point is hidden, try manual setup
wifiScan.foundWifi: Wi-Fi networks discovered by your device
wifiScan.selectWifi: select the Wi-Fi network for the device to connect to
wifiScan.scanningInProgressInfo: your IoT device is scanning for nearby Wi-Fi networks. Please wait...

error.title: Wi-Fi scan failed
error.description: you can close the setup flow and try again.

wifiConfig.title: configure Wi-Fi
wifiConfig.intro: to set up Wi-Fi on your IoT device, please enter the required details below.
wifiConfig.warning5Ghz: Please, keep in mind that Wi-Fi setup may not be supported on 5GHz networks.

success.title: your device is set up and added to your list.
success.description: you can now finish the setup and go to device list view.

error.title: Wi-Fi Setup Failed
error.description: you can close the setup flow and try again.
